abstract: BHP Billiton, the world’s biggest mining company, has won support from top investors to get back on the acquisition trail after last year’s failed bid for rival Rio Tinto, a newspaper report said on Sunday, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton, the world’s biggest mining company, has won support from top investors to get back on the acquisition trail after last year’s failed bid for rival Rio Tinto, a newspaper report said on Sunday, according to Reuters.

headline.main: BHP Said to Win Support for More Deal-Making
